title: Make Device Manager ACTUALLY Useful by Renaming Devices
description:
Finally a way to make Device Manager useful

⇒ Become a channel member for special emojis, early videos, and more! Check it out here: https://www.youtube.com/ThioJoe/join

Links:
• USBDeview: https://www.nirsoft.net/utils/usb_devices_view.html (Download link is near bottom of page)
• USBLogView: https://www.nirsoft.net/utils/usb_log_view.html (Download link is near bottom of page)
• USB Device Tree Viewer: https://www.uwe-sieber.de/usbtreeview_e.html#download
